title: 20r Gaming Community Recruitment

embed.description: A gaming community to play multiple games in an organised and friendly way

body:
The 20r is a European Gaming Community which is made up of friendly and Skillfull League of Legends Players.

We currently have two active teams and are hoping to expand and have a lot more members in the future. Our first team is Gold/Plat Elo and our second is Silver Elo

You can join us if you meet these requirements:
- Level 30
- You can be any Elo/or role we don't mind
- Older than 14 years of age
- Must be able to speak and understand english
- Have teamspeak 3
- Be mature and responsible

In order to join us apply on our website http://20r.eu/ or hop on our teamspeak 37.220.21.67:10102

Thank you for your time, we hope to see you in our community in the near future.

Noop,
Leader of the League of Legends Division

Great clan! Thanks for teaching me all I know!
I would like to join if you and your mates don't mind
yes sure come the website log on come ts and meet us :D
